title: Treating Ukraineâ€™s Wounded Civilians, I Saw Horror and Hope
sub_head: The injuries they suffered in Kharkiv brought back memories of my experience as a volunteer in Syria.
body:
Kharkiv, Ukraine
The streets outside the hospital here are pockmarked with craters from munitions. The windows are covered in plywood. The halls are crowded with patients because in their rooms they would be vulnerable to bomb blasts and flying glass.
